55.eng-name: The Book of Zuhd and Softening of Hearts

hadiths.text: Ibn Abbas reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:If anyone wants to have his deeds widely publicised, Allah will publicise (his humiliation). And if anyone makes a hypocritical display (of his deeds) Allah will make a display of him

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ أَشْرَكَ فِي عَمَلِهِ غَيْرَ اللَّهِ
